root.name: Race: The Official WTCC Game
root.description: This is the first of two full games in the World Touring Car championship (the second being WTC 07).This game is available to buy on DVD rom or through the Steam network.This game features simulation handling for real life cars through the FIA World Toruing Car championship. The realistic graphics and handling are impressive for a game of its age and can be off putting to new players of this sports game.The main modes include:WTC full season - play in the FIA World Touring Car championship for 2006 or 1980's for the retro times.Single Event - Race one grand prix rather than the whole season.These modes include the full practice and qualification modes.Also included is quick race and multiplayer through online and network races.The game visits locations around the world from Monza (Italy) to Curitiba (Brazil) and features many car manufacturers (Seat, Honda, BMW, etc).A recent expansion also allows you to lay as Caterham race cars which are open wheel cars similar to the Arial Atom's which provided gamers with much fun on Project Gotham Racing 3.Overall, this is a great racing simulation game featuring real rules, excellent tracks, and fantastic graphics.One for the racing fans.
